Items.sapEN: Lost years are worse than lost dollars.
Items.sapCH: 一寸光阴一寸金,寸今难买寸光阴。

Items.sapEN: Nothing is to be got without pain but poverty.
Items.sapCH: 世上唯有贫穷可以不劳而获。

Items.sapEN: God helps those who help themselves.
Items.sapCH: 自助者天助。

Items.sapEN: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labour does the body.
Items.sapCH: 劳动强体,磨难强智。

Items.sapEN: Follow your own course, and let people talk.
Items.sapCH: 走自己的路,让别人说去吧。

Items.sapEN: Adversity reveals genius, fortune conceals it.
Items.sapCH: 苦难显才华,好运藏天知。

Items.sapEN: The water that bears the boat is the same that swallows it up.
Items.sapCH: 水能载舟,亦能覆舟。

Items.sapEN: Better be the head of a dog than the tail of a lion.
Items.sapCH: 宁为鸡头,不为凤尾。

Items.sapEN: All the Evils to be considered with the Good, that is in them, and with that worse attends them.
Items.sapCH: 祸兮福所依,福兮祸所伏。

Items.sapEN: Make your whole year''s plan in the spring and the whole day''s plan in the morning.
Items.sapCH: 一年之计在于春,一天之计在于晨。

Items.sapEN: Early to bed, early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
Items.sapCH: 早睡早起身体好。

Items.sapEN: Rejoicing in hope, patienting in trabulation.
Items.sapCH: 从希望中得到快乐,在磨难中保持坚韧。

Items.sapEN: Never put off until tomorrow what may be done today.
Items.sapCH: 今日事今日毕。

Items.sapEN: Something attempted, something done.
Items.sapCH: 没有尝试,就没有成功。

Items.sapEN: Hope for the best, prepare for the worst.
Items.sapCH: 好处着想,坏处准备。

Items.sapEN: A hedge between keeps friendship green.
Items.sapCH: 君子之交淡如水。

Items.sapEN: Take time while time is, for time will away.
Items.sapCH: 机不可失,时不再来。

Items.sapEN: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.
Items.sapCH: 必须相信自己,这是成功的秘诀。

Items.sapEN: A sparrow cannot understand the ambition of a swan.
Items.sapCH: 燕雀安知鸿鹄之志。

Items.sapEN: A straight foot is not afraid of a crooked shoe.
Items.sapCH: 身正不怕影子歪。

Items.sapEN: The good seaman is known in bad weather.
Items.sapCH: 惊涛骇浪,方显英雄本色。

Items.sapEN: Business sweetens pleasure, and labor sweetens rest.
Items.sapCH: 努力付出后的果实最甜美。

Items.sapEN: Ambition never dies until there is no way out.
Items.sapCH: 不到黄河心不死。

Items.sapEN: A thief passes for a gentleman when thieving has made him rich.
Items.sapCH: 成则为王,败则为寇。

Items.sapEN: False friends are worse than bitter enemies.
Items.sapCH: 明枪易躲,暗箭难防。

Items.sapEN: Fortune knocks once at least at every man's gate.
Items.sapCH: 风水轮流转。

Items.sapEN: A bird in the hand is worth than two in the bush.
Items.sapCH: 一鸟在手胜过双鸟在林。

Items.sapEN: A joke never gains an enemy but loses a friend.
Items.sapCH: 戏谑不能化敌为友,只能使人失去朋友。

Items.sapEN: All things are difficult before they are easy.
Items.sapCH: 万事开头难。

Items.sapEN: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.
Items.sapCH: 只会用功不玩耍,聪明孩子也变傻。

Items.sapEN: A man becomes learned by asking questions.
Items.sapCH: 不耻下问才能有学问。

Items.sapEN: A man cannot spin and reel at the same time.
Items.sapCH: 一心不能二用。

Items.sapEN: A man without money is no man at all.
Items.sapCH: 一分钱难倒英雄汉。

Items.sapEN: An hour in the morning is worth two in the evening.
Items.sapCH: 一日之计在于晨。

Items.sapEN: By reading we enrich the mind, by conversation we polish it.
Items.sapCH: 读书使人充实,交谈使人明智。

Items.sapEN: He who does not advance loses ground.
Items.sapCH: 逆水行舟,不进则退。

Items.sapEN: It is better to die when life is a disgrace.
Items.sapCH: 宁为玉碎,不为瓦全。

Items.sapEN: Keep good men company and you shall be of the number.
Items.sapCH: 近朱者赤,近墨者黑。

Items.sapEN: Knowledge makes humble, ignorance makes proud.
Items.sapCH: 博学使人谦逊,无知使人骄傲。

Items.sapEN: Many things grow in the garden that were never sown there.
Items.sapCH: 有心栽花花不发,无心插柳柳成荫。

Items.sapEN: Nothing in the world is difficult for one who sets his mind to it.
Items.sapCH: 世上无难事,只怕有心人。

Items.sapEN: The fox knew too much, that's how he lost his tail.
Items.sapCH: 机关算尽太聪明,反误了卿卿性命。

Items.sapEN: The frog in the well knows nothing of the great ocean.
Items.sapCH: 井底之蛙，只能坐井观天。

Items.sapEN: The greatest talkers are always least doers.
Items.sapCH: 语言的巨人总是行动的矮子。

Items.sapEN: The wise man knows he knows nothing, the fool thinks he knows all.
Items.sapCH: 智者知不足,愚者多自负。

Items.sapEN: The wolf has a winning game when the shepherds quarrel.
Items.sapCH: 螳螂捕蝉,黄雀在后。

Items.sapEN: Two dogs strive for a bone, and a third runs away with it.
Items.sapCH: 鹬蚌相争,渔翁得利。

Items.sapEN: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
Items.sapCH: 虽然身在井隅,但仍有人心向星空。

Items.sapEN: May there be enough clouds in your life to make a beautiful sunset.
Items.sapCH: 愿你的生命中有足够的云翳,来造成一个美丽的黄昏。

Items.sapEN: Life is like a box of chocolates, you never know what you are going to get.
Items.sapCH: 生活就像一盒巧克力,你永远不知道下一个是什么。

Items.sapEN: To be or not to be, that is the question.
Items.sapCH: 生存还是毁灭,这是个问题。

Items.sapEN: To ask why we fight, is to ask why the leaves fall.
Items.sapCH: 我们生而为战,犹如树叶自会飘落。

Items.sapEN: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Items.sapCH: 像你明天就会离世那样生活,像你可以永葆青春那样学习。

Items.sapEN: Years fly by, but the heart stays in the same place.
Items.sapCH: 时光飞逝,但我心依旧。

Items.sapEN: Let life be beautiful like summer flowers and death like autume leaves.
Items.sapCH: 生如夏花之绚烂,死如秋叶之静美。

Items.sapEN:
I saw you
You smiled warmly
The world began waking up.
Items.sapCH:
我看到你了
你笑的那么温暖
让世界都开始苏醒。

Items.sapEN: Hope is good thing, maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever dies.
Items.sapCH: 希望是件美丽的东西,也许是最好的东西。美好的东西是永远不会死的。

Items.sapEN: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
Items.sapCH: 每一个不曾起舞的日子,都是对生命的辜负。

Items.sapEN: You laugh at me for being different, but I laugh at you for being the same.
Items.sapCH: 你嘲笑我和别人不一样,我嘲笑你和大家都一样。

Items.sapEN: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
Items.sapCH: 经验是个很苛刻的老师,因为她总是一上来就把你考倒,然后才给你上课。

Items.sapEN: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
Items.sapCH: 生活,不是用我们呼吸了多少下来衡量的,而是要看我们多少次屏住呼吸 。

Items.sapEN: Fear not that the life shall come to an end, but rather fear that it shall never have a beginning.
Items.sapCH: 不要害怕你的生活将要结束,应该担心你的生活永远不曾真正开始。

Items.sapEN: Had I not seen the Sun, I could have borne the shade.
Items.sapCH: 我本可以忍受黑暗,如果我不曾见过阳光。

Items.sapEN: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
Items.sapCH: 世上之事物本无善恶之分,思想使然。

Items.sapEN: Out, out, brief candle, life is but a walking shadow.
Items.sapCH: 熄灭吧,熄灭吧,瞬间的灯火。人生只不过是行走着的影子。

Items.sapEN: Your happy passer-by all knows, my distressed there is no place hides.
Items.sapCH: 你的幸福路人皆知,我的狼狈无处遁形。

Items.sapEN: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
Items.sapCH: 到头来,你活了多少岁不算什么,重要的是,你是如何度过这些岁月的。

Items.sapEN: You may be out of my sight, but never out of my mind.
Items.sapCH: 你也许已走出我的视线,但从未走出我的思念。

Items.sapEN: Life is a journey, not the destination, but the scenery along the should be and the mood at the view.
Items.sapCH: 人生就是一场旅行,不在乎目的地,在乎的应该是沿途的风景以及看风景的心情。

Items.sapEN: What’s in a name? That which we call a rose by any other word would smell as sweet.
Items.sapCH: 名字中有什么呢？玫瑰就算不叫做玫瑰,它还是一样的芬芳。

Items.sapEN: Tis this times’ plague, when madmen lead the blind.
Items.sapCH: 疯子带瞎子走路,这就是这个时代的病态。

Items.sapEN: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
Items.sapCH: 成功并不在于从不犯错,而在于不重蹈覆辙。

Items.sapEN: I put the wait time are used to miss, it becomes short very.
Items.sapCH: 我把等待的时光都用来想念,它就变得短暂的很。

Items.sapEN: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
Items.sapCH: 生活就像骑单车,只有不断前进,才能保持平衡。

Items.sapEN: If I had a single flower for every time I think about you, I could walk forever in my garden.
Items.sapCH: 假如每次想起你我都会得到一朵鲜花,那么我将永远在花丛中徜徉。
